const downloadReport=(file,result)=>{const report={fileName:file.name,fileSize:file.size,fileType:file.type,analysisDate:new Date().toISOString(),verificationResult:result};const blob=new Blob([JSON.stringify(report,null,2)],{type:'application/json'});const url=URL.createObjectURL(blob);const a=document.createElement('a');a.href=url;a.download="verification-report-".concat(file.name.split('.')[0],".json");document.body.appendChild(a);a.click();document.body.removeChild(a);URL.revokeObjectURL(url);};export default VerificationResult;
